towerTemplates.name: Brute Force
towerTemplates.tooltipText: This tower doesn't hit hard BUT it hits very very, did I say very, fast.

towerTemplates.name: ROFL Launcher
towerTemplates.tooltipText: ROFL's aren't to be messed with. This tower launches them into the fray where they bounce from enemy to enemy.

towerTemplates.name: Bull Market Den
towerTemplates.tooltipText: Out of this den comes the Bull, and they are here to take care of business!
